name: I'ts BIGGER than HIP HOP
description:
A game I created as part of the course  "Gamedev Unlock" by David Wehle. 

I created it to get to know more of Unity's features and get inspired for a big game I'm working on right now that called - ADVENTURAP.

the idea is to create a game (ADVENTURAP) about dealing with loss and finding a new way to express difficulty and coping. I really liked the game “a short hike”. so I also will try to create a short open world game that takes place in the neighborhood where I grew up in. and to tell about a boy who lost his father and is now trying to come back to life and get out of apathy. With the help of family and friends he discover that rap and songwriting helps him cope and express himself. 

If you want to follow my work and the construction of the game, you are welcome to join me for discovery and creation.
